# List of Russian armies in World War I

Russian army formations in World War I include:
* 1st Army
* 2nd Army
* 3rd Army
* 4th Army
* 5th Army
* 6th Army
* 7th Army
* 8th Army
* 9th Army
* 10th Army
* 11th Army
* 12th Army
* 13th Army
* Caucasus Army
* Dobruja Army
* Danube Army
* Special Army
See also
* Lists of armies
* Imperial Russian Army formations and units (1914)
